name: GENESIS LANDS DROP
textcontent: An original collection of 5.555 land plots will be made ready for the very first Dusktopian adventurers.

name: STAKING GOES LIVE
textcontent: The EON Corporation Superbank begins rewarding Dusktopians staking their land plots with $DAWN.

name: NEW WORLDS EMERGE
textcontent: Claim a slice of our secret land collection with $DAWN. Outfit your existing land with new properties and accessories.

name: AVATAR COLLECTION DROP
textcontent: Get the PFP avatars you will use for in-universe interaction, synergized with your asset holdings.
